tool_description: An API showing the latest official PDC Order or Merit, which ranks the best Darts Players of the world.
name: PDC Order of Merit
title: PDC Order of Merit

api_list.name: Get Order of Merit
api_list.description: This Endpoint will return back the current official Order of Merit as published by the PDC.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdc-order-of-merit.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdc-order-of-merit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pdc-order-of-merit.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdc-order-of-merit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
